snippet: The senator’s run far exceeded many expectations, but he ultimately failed to persuade Republicans to rally behind him as an alternative to Donald J. Trump.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz, whose Republican presidential nomination bid began strongly but ultimately fell to Donald Trump, maintained consistent ideological message throughout contest aimed at angry conservative base; Cruz's calls for conservative purity failed to find traction beyond religious and ideological voters while his efforts were undercut by his poor relations with Senate colleagues.
lead_paragraph: The senator’s run far exceeded many expectations, but he ultimately failed to persuade Republicans to rally behind him as an alternative to Donald J. Trump.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Suspends His Campaign for President
headline.print_headline: Trump Nears Nomination as Cruz Drops Out
